result.execSummary:
The defendant Timothy T Johnson was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Disorderly Conduct [Modifiers: Use of a Dangerous Weapon], a class B misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 947.01(1).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

records.addlTxt:
Sentencing proceeded.  Statements by the State, defense and defendant.       


Defendant sentenced to serve 60 days in the House of Correction with credit for 1 day time served.  COURT STAYED THE SENTENCE and placed the defendant on probation for 1 year with the State of Wisconsin, 

Department of Corrections for a period of CONDITIONS OF PROBATION:

     *   If revoked defendant is allowed HUBER for work only.
     *   AODA assessment. Defendant to cooperate with any treatment recommended.
     *   Defendant to pay all applicable costs and surcharges
          by 7/6/2016. Failure to pay will result in a 
          civil judgment.
     *   No firearms

Defendant Timothy T Johnson in court with attorney Danielle L. Shelton.  Brittany Skye Kachingwe appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  


Defendant changes plea to GUILTY. Defendant examined as to his plea, advised of his Constitutional rights and the maximum penalty. Court found that defendant freely, voluntarily and intelligently waived his rights. Plea questionnaire received and filed. Parties stipulate to the complaint as a factual basis to sustain defendant's plea. Court found defendant guilty as charged in the information and ordered a Judgment of Conviction be entered on the record. Defendant further advised that if he is not a US citizen deportation is possible.

Defendant Timothy T Johnson in court.  Brittany Skye Kachingwe appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk: TC. Case calendared for projected guilty plea and sentencing. Defense counsel is unavailable for today's proceedings, due to scheduling conflict.   Court ordered case adjourned for projected guilty plea and sentencing in Branch 31.   Agreed Upon Request for a New Court Date is signed and filed.  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for January 6, 2016 at 01:30 pm.

Defendant Timothy T Johnson in court with attorney Danielle L. Shelton.  Jacob Daniel Corr appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk: TC. Court ordered case adjourned for projected guilty plea and sentencing in Branch 31. All parties are notified that effective 12-01-15 this case will be assigned to Reserved Branch, Branch 31, in Room 615 of the Courthouse.
  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for December 10, 2015 at 01:30 pm.

Defendant Timothy T Johnson in court with attorney Danielle L. Shelton.  Brittany Skye Kachingwe appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk: TC. Case calendared for status of counsel, new attorney present. For reasons stated on the record,   Court ordered case adjourned for status conference in Branch  Status conference scheduled for October 21, 2015 at 08:30 am.

Defendant Timothy T Johnson in court with attorney Alexis B Stewart.  Brittany Skye Kachingwe appeared for the State of Wisconsin.   Deputy Court Clerk: TC. Case calendared for final pre-trial. 

Defense motion to withdraw as counsel is granted by the court. Defense counsel will notify Public Defender's Office to appoint new counsel for the defendant.  Case adjourned for status of counsel in branch 37. Defense counsel is awaiting additional discovery. Court ordered jury trial on August 24, 2015 at 9:00 CONVERTED to status of counsel.

Defendant Timothy T Johnson in court with attorney Alexis B Stewart.  Brittany Skye Kachingwe appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk: TC. Case calendared for projected guilty plea and sentencing. Defense counsel requests jury trial date.    Defense counsel has received discovery and offer.  Any and all motions are to be filed with the court by the final pretrial date.  Case is adjourned for Final Pretrial Conference and Jury Trial, Branch 37.  Final pre-trial scheduled for July 27, 2015 at 08:30 am.  Jury trial scheduled for August 24, 2015 at 09:00 am.

Defendant Timothy T Johnson in court with attorney Alexis B Stewart.  Alex T. Mueller appeared for the State of Wisconsin.   Deputy Court Clerk: TC.   Court ordered case adjourned for projected guilty plea and sentencing in Branch 37.   Agreed Upon Request for a New Court Date is signed and filed.  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for June 23, 2015 at 01:30 pm.

Defendant Timothy T Johnson in court with attorney Alexis B Stewart.  Alex T. Mueller appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  
Deputy Court Clerk: tmk.   
Defense counsel has received some discovery and requesting a status date.  Case is adjourned for status conference in  Branch 37.  Agreed Upon Request for a New Court Date is signed and filed.  Status conference scheduled for April 29, 2015 at 08:30 am.
No possession of any dangerous weapons during the pendency of this case. If Defendant is a CCW owner. This order will supercede the CCW by the Court.

Defendant Timothy T Johnson in court.  Jay Randal Pucek appeared for the State of Wisconsin.    Defendant advised that this case is assigned to Judge Dee, Branch 37. Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause.   Defendant received a copy of the complaint and was advised of right to counsel and maximum penalties.  Court entered a plea of not guilty on behalf of the Defendant. Court reserves Defendant's right to file a substitution of judge pursuant to Sec. 971.20 until Defendant's next scheduled court appearance.  Defendant IS Public Defender eligible.  Defendant is ordered to provide the public defender's office with the next court date.  The case is adjourned to Br. 37 for a Pretrial Conference.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for April 1, 2015 at 01:30 pm.
Defendant is Out-of-Custody. Court appearance in Out-Of-Custody Court, Room 221 Safety Building on 3-23-2015 at 1:30pm
